MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the CH3 and CH4 postcode areas of Chester, affecting properties in Churchton, Aldford, Farndon, Eccleston and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  11:56AM. Our control centre will attempt to reset the network remotely to restore power in stages, and our emergency response team are on their way to the area to investigate. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 2PM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:27PM on 13th February 2021
